message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  That's a bit high for me though.  Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $90, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $115?
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and make it $105?
I like the spirit of compromise, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to go up to $125?
